# GET /v1/apps/{id}/relationships/marketplaceSearchDetail | Apple Developer Documentation

- [ App Store Connect API ](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi)

-  GET /v1/apps/{id}/relationships/marketplaceSearchDetail 

Web Service Endpoint# GET /v1/apps/{id}/relationships/marketplaceSearchDetail

App Store Connect API 3.6+## [URL](/documentation/AppStoreConnectAPI/GET-v1-apps-_id_-relationships-marketplaceSearchDetail#url)



```
GET https://api.appstoreconnect.apple.com/v1/apps/{id}/relationships/marketplaceSearchDetail
```

## [Path Parameters](/documentation/AppStoreConnectAPI/GET-v1-apps-_id_-relationships-marketplaceSearchDetail#path-parameters)

`id``string` (Required) 

## [Response Codes](/documentation/AppStoreConnectAPI/GET-v1-apps-_id_-relationships-marketplaceSearchDetail#response-codes)

` 200 OK``[AppMarketplaceSearchDetailLinkageResponse`](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/appmarketplacesearchdetaillinkageresponse)`OK`
